languages.text: "Твой писарь Горгориус Фальт оставил прелюбопытные записки. Кажется, в них он описывал смену... тел? Это часть твоего плана?"

traits.locale_text: "Твой писарь Горгориус Фальт явно грезил о новом теле. Это и есть твой план? Занять мое тело?"

languages.text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"
languages.original_text: "Твой писарь Горгориус Фальт оставил прелюбопытные записки. Кажется, в них он описывал смену... тел? Это часть твоего плана?"

traits.locale_text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt obviously dreamed of a new body. Was that also part of your plan?"
"Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"
"Your scribe Gorgorius Falt obviously dreamed of a new body. Was that also part of your plan?"
"Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"
"Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"
"Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"

languages.text: “你的缮写员戈里乌斯·法尔特留下了某些很有趣的笔记。他的笔记提到了某种交换……身体的内容？这也是你计划的一部分吗？”
languages.original_text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"

traits.locale_text: “你的缮写员戈里乌斯·法尔特留下了某些很有趣的笔记。他的笔记提到了某种交换……身体的内容？这也是你计划的一部分吗？”
“很显然，你之前的缮写员戈里乌斯·法尔特渴望得到新的身体，这也是你计划的一部分吧？”

languages.text: «Su escriba, Gorgorius Falt, dejó unas notas muy interesantes. Parece que describe una forma de cambiar de... ¿cuerpo? ¿Forma eso parte de su plan?».
languages.original_text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"

traits.locale_text: «Su escriba, Gorgorius Falt, dejó unas notas muy interesantes. Parece que describe una forma de cambiar de... ¿cuerpo? ¿Forma eso parte de su plan?».

languages.text: "Kâtibiniz Gorgorius Falt, hayli ilginç notlar bırakmış. Anladığım kadarıyla... Vücutların değiştirilmesinden bahsediyor. Bu da planının bir parçası mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"

traits.locale_text: "Kâtibiniz Gorgorius Falt, hayli ilginç notlar bırakmış. Anladığım kadarıyla... Vücutların değiştirilmesinden bahsediyor. Bu da planının bir parçası mıydı?"
"Kâtibin Gorgorius Falt, belli ki yeni bir bedenin hayalini kuruyormuş. Planın bununla mı ilgiliydi?"

languages.text: 「君の書記官ゴルゴリウス・ファルトが興味深いメモを残した。そこには…『体を入れ替える』ことについて書かれているようだ。これは君の計画の一部なのか？」
languages.original_text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"

traits.locale_text: 「君の書記官ゴルゴリウス・ファルトが興味深いメモを残した。そこには…『体を入れ替える』ことについて書かれているようだ。これは君の計画の一部なのか？」
「書記官ゴルゴリウス・ファルトは明らかに新しい体を夢見ていた。それがこの計画の目的なんだろう？」

languages.text: « Votre scribe, Gorgorius Falt, a laissé des notes intrigantes dans lesquelles il semble décrire un échange de... corps ? Cela fait-il partie de votre plan ? »
languages.original_text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre scribe, Gorgorius Falt, a laissé des notes intrigantes dans lesquelles il semble décrire un échange de... corps ? Cela fait-il partie de votre plan ? »

languages.text: "Euer Schreiber Gorgorius Fals hat einige interessante Notizen hinterlassen. Darin beschreibt er anscheinend das Auswechseln von ... Körpern? Ist das Teil Eures Plans?
languages.original_text: "Your scribe Gorgorius Falt left some intriguing notes behind. In them, he appears to be describing the switching of... bodies? Is that part of your plan?"
